Title: Relates to allowing the federal government access to certain department of motor vehicles information; repealer
Summary: Allows the federal government access to certain department of motor vehicles information for the purposes of reviewing applications for federal programs or for the purposes of investigating a person for federal law enforcement and/or national security issues.
LawCode: Rpld ยง201 sub 12, amd ยง201, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing the federal government access to certain department of motor vehicles information for the purposes of reviewing applications for federal programs, federal law enforcement, national security and used car exports; and to repeal certain provisions of such law related thereto
